params.amount: The amount of tokens withdrawn, can be less than the config amount if the vault does not have the funds available to cover the config amount.
params.config: All config sent to the `withdraw` call.

params.config_: All config required to withdraw. Notably if the amount is less than the current vault balance then the vault will be cleared to 0 rather than the withdraw transaction reverting.

storageOpcodesRange().notice: Default is to disallow all storage access to opcodes.

withdraw((address,uint256,uint256)).notice: Allows the sender to withdraw any tokens from their own vaults.
